
{{alias}}( x1, x2[, ...xN] )
    Returns the n-fold Cartesian product.

    If one or more input arrays are empty, the function returns an empty array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x1: ArrayLikeObject
        First input array.

    x2: ArrayLikeObject
        Second input array.

    xN: ...ArrayLikeObject (optional)
        Additional input arrays.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array<Array>
        Cartesian product.

    Examples
    --------
    > var x1 = [ 1, 2 ];
    > var x2 = [ 3, 4 ];
    > var out = {{alias}}( x1, x2 )
    [ [ 1, 3 ], [ 1, 4 ], [ 2, 3 ], [ 2, 4 ] ]

    See Also
    --------
